com.company

Class Rummy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Rummy

  • public class Rummy
extends java.lang.Object
    The underlying code for a game of Rummy. Currently uses text based input and output for the player.

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Card>> getMelds()
        Getter for the melds for each player
